# Dagger, Punching
## Overview
A punching dagger’s blade is attached to a horizontal handle that projects out from the fist when held.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Light Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Dagger, punching | 2 gp | 1d3 | 1d4 | x3 | — | 1 lb. | P | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 146
